BIC Tissue Code and Name

Source: R/data.R
bic_animal_tissue_code.Rd

BIC Tissue Code and Name

bic_animal_tissue_code

Format

A data frame with tissue codes

bic_tissue_code

T + integer, as encoded in vial_label by DMAQC

bic_tissue_name

Tissue name (as provided by DMAQC)

motrpac_tissue_code

Both code and tissue name

tissue_name_release

Code + tissue name as used in releases

abbreviation

Tissue abbreviation

tissue_hex_colour

Tissue Hex Colour code

Examples

if (FALSE) {
 bic_animal_tissue_code
}
